long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Users can perform the following percentage calculations:

- What is X% of Y
- X is what % of Y
- % increase/decrease from X to Y
- X + Y%
- X - Y%
- X * Y%
- X / Y%
